content: This tracker FHIR#29826 is not updating with the issue it duplicate ( FHIR#30110 which is applied) can we get that fixed?
Why would you expect it to update? When you mark something as 'Duplicate', then it's essentially 'closed' with a final resolution. All action happens on the referenced item.
it is still has a status of triaged. Which is not correct right? the duplicate issue status is applied
This is not the behavior of other duplicates their status' update which the underlying trackers

On 2021-03-25 07:33, you changed the status from Duplicate to "Resolved - change required". How did you do that? Did you do a bulk edit or something? Because that shouldn't have been a valid state transition. The only thing you should be able to do from a 'Duplicate' is make it non-duplicate, which would bump you back to triaged and drop the link. Somehow you found a way around that. When you tell me how you managed it, I'll try to close the hole.
At this point, now that the target is resolved, you can't mark 29826 as resolved again, so you'll have to resolve it and vote it as normal.
